title: SQLite
description: SQLite is a lightweight, serverless, self-contained SQL database engine.

snippets.Basic Commands:
# Open database
sqlite3 database.db

# Show tables
.tables

# Show schema
.schema table_name

# Exit
.quit

# Import CSV
.mode csv
.import file.csv table_name

# Export to CSV
.mode csv
.output data.csv
SELECT * FROM table_name;
snippets.Create Table:
CREATE TABLE users (
    id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT,
    name TEXT NOT NULL,
    email TEXT UNIQUE,
    age INTEGER,
    created_at DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP
);
snippets.Insert Data:
-- Insert single row
INSERT INTO users (name, email, age)
VALUES ('John', 'john@example.com', 30);

-- Insert multiple rows
INSERT INTO users (name, email, age)
VALUES 
    ('Alice', 'alice@example.com', 25),
    ('Bob', 'bob@example.com', 35);
snippets.Update Data:
-- Update single row
UPDATE users
SET age = 31
WHERE name = 'John';

-- Update multiple columns
UPDATE users
SET age = 26, email = 'newemail@example.com'
WHERE id = 1;
snippets.Joins:
-- Inner join
SELECT users.name, orders.total
FROM users
INNER JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id;

-- Left join
SELECT users.name, orders.total
FROM users
LEFT JOIN orders ON users.id = orders.user_id;
